long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ProCause extension allows you to connect with businesses that support the causes you care about. 

When you make searches on the internet, businesses that support your causes are highlighted and brought to the top of search results. 

By choosing to support recommended businesses, they can continue to make donations towards the causes you care about. 

Create a positive impact and raise awareness by connecting with the right businesses.
